CueName.description: The name of the cue to switch to. If empty, the music will just fade out.

FadeOutTime.description: How long it takes for the music to fade out before switching to the next song.

PlayDelayTime.description: How long to wait after the music has faded out before switching to the next song.

FadeInTime.description: How long it takes for the next song to fade in.

Extra.value: Changes the background music when you come in contact with it.
